subject: Temporal Correction & Semantic Enrichment of Atomic Memories
description: Re-map migrated JSON memories from Feb 1st back to their original January dates based on legacy archive sources. Enrich technical_traces with paths and artifacts identified in the Markdown logs to ensure high-fidelity semantic retrieval.

history.summary: Detected temporal drift and data flattening in Atomic Memory migration. Initiating correction.

Successfully re-mapped strategic memories (Shantanu Sync, UXR Platforming, WHOOP v2) to original Jan dates. Consolidated fragmented architectural directories into soul/blueprints/. Purged legacy base16-shell state. Updated README.md with new Soul mechanics. PR #8 merged and PR #9 opened.
